attributes.action: Stop All illegal and economic migrants. We demand a referendum.
attributes.additional_details:
This is costing us, the tax Payers £6.8 million a day so far, this will increase considerably before the end of the year! With 40,000 crossing the Channel (that we know of), there will be more to come! We were promised control of our Borders and its just not happening! We've had enough!
This IS an invasion. We want our Island back!
attributes.background: Nothing is being done about illegal and economic migrants. We demand a voice! We demand a referendum on immigration as a whole. This is now a serious issue and a National emergency and serious security risk! Our little Island is sinking under the weight, pressure and dangers!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/627339
